input.sentences: we took a small trip to the rural lands today .
we saw one that was shaped like a castle .
we even saw this fancy looking one .
overall | we had a great time and saw many amazing buildings .
output.sentences: There once was a long road in a beautiful town.
The road lead to a red brick building.
The road also lead to a fancy castle looking building.
That same road will also take you to a building with a red roof.
The road will take you to a building with many windows.
